name: aerobus
keywords: message bus, pubsub, fluent, ES2015, ES6
author: Denis Vlassenko <denis_vlassenko@epam.com>

scripts.all: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test && npm run doc
scripts.rollup: npm run rollup-es2015 && npm run rollup-umd
scripts.build: npm run rollup && npm run babel && npm run uglify
scripts.doc: npm run doc-lib && npm run doc-spec
scripts.doc-lib: node_modules/.bin/jsdoc2md build/modern/aerobus.js > doc/readme.md --global-index-format dl --member-index-format grouped --module-index-format grouped --param-list-format list --property-list-format list --sort-by name
scripts.doc-spec: node_modules/.bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register src/aerobus.spec.js --reporter markdown --require core-js > spec/readme.md
